name: FeatureCardTwentyFour
description: Two-column feature card list with title, author, description, tags, and media.

description.example: Stay updated with our latest announcements

buttonRules.note: Button variant is controlled by ThemeProvider's defaultButtonVariant.

structure.title: string
structure.author: string
structure.media: Either imageSrc (with optional imageAlt) OR videoSrc (with optional videoAriaLabel)

itemRules.note: Each feature requires id, title, author, description, tags array. Media uses discriminated union.

propsSchema.features: FeatureItem[] (required) - Array with id, title, author, description, tags[], imageSrc/videoSrc
propsSchema.title: string

usageExample:
<ThemeProvider defaultButtonVariant="icon-arrow" borderRadius="rounded">
  <FeatureCardTwentyFour
    title="Latest Features"
    description="Stay updated with our latest announcements."
    tag="Features"
    tagIcon={Sparkles}
    textboxLayout="default"
    animationType="fade"
    useInvertedBackground="none"
    features={[
      {
        id: "1",
        title: "Building the Future of Web Development",
        author: "John Doe",
        description: "A comprehensive guide to modern web technologies.",
        tags: ["Development", "Tutorial"],
        imageSrc: "/feature1.jpg"
      },
      {
        id: "2",
        title: "Design Systems at Scale",
        author: "Jane Smith",
        description: "How to build and maintain design systems.",
        tags: ["Design", "Systems"],
        imageSrc: "/feature2.jpg"
      }
    ]}
  />
</ThemeProvider>
do: Use for feature articles, case studies, or content with author attribution
Include relevant tags for each feature
dont: Do not use without author attribution
Do not use for simple feature lists without descriptions
